subject: Re: Reminder: Order #SSN2706, how did it go?
description_text:
I bought this because I was having trouble with the motors getting stuck
on. Still having issues with it. I am fully updated and grounded

On Wed, Oct 15, 2025, 1:16 PM SIMSONN <no-reply@loox.io> wrote:

> Hello Alyk, We would be grateful if you shared how things look and feel.
> Your review helps us and the community that supports us, and it only takes
> a few
